title: I am Very Sorry !!!
body: My account was suspended on 3/27/16 i am very very sorry for what happend and i would love to play Leauge of Legends again . it has been over a year sense i played and i am ready to be mature and Make sure nobody else plays on my account . back on 3/27/16 i let my little brother play with his bestfriend JOHN , he got my account suspended for using obseen language in the chat . it has been over a year sense i played and i would like to be given another chance . nowthat my little brother moved on to college he is no longer in my house which means im the only one with access to my account . I am sorry and i will never let this happen again . I was not smart and it was the worst decision of my life to let my little brother play . I ONLY LET HIM PLAY because i have so many skins that he was practically BEGGING me to use my account . I never ever knew that he could get my account SUSPENDED .I AM SO SORRY from the BOTTOM OF MY HEART . and i would just love a second chance . this time i will never ever ever let anyone play on my account . This has taught me my lesson ! If you guys are reading this NEVER let anyone else play your account !!!!!!!!!!! riot please help me!

replies.body: Aw man, that really sucks that your little brother did that. There's not a whole lot I can do here on the boards, but you can always reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to talk about what happened and see if anything can be done.

BroPoro i did and this is what i got in reply

Hey Trillest,

First I have to inform you that account sharing of any kind is against our terms of use and is in and of itself a bannable offense. Ultimately, each player is responsible for their own account and the actions taken on that account. We provide a password and username to each player in order to help maintain security, but if you chose to share these credentials with another person, there isn't anything further we can do, and you are still responsible for their actions on your account.

Sadly, I cannot remove this suspension due to the hate-speech observed.

I'm sorry our journey with your account had to end like this, but this is our final word on the matter.

Thank you for your time.

Borrower
Riot Games Player Support

"To heal and protect"
